bean.p:messageText: [image src="@{#ConfigProperties['krad.externalizable.images.url']}/validation/info.png"] Adding colocated activities here will delete their requested or actual scheduling information and replace them with the scheduling information from this activity offering.

bean.p:value: Share max enrollment across all activities

bean.p:messageText: [image src="@{#ConfigProperties['krad.externalizable.images.url']}/validation/info.png"] Max enrollment is shared by all co-located activities. [br] Any changes made here will update the other activities on save.
[image src="@{#ConfigProperties['krad.externalizable.images.url']}/validation/info.png"] The max enrollments for all co-located activities will be combined. Any changes may effect room availability.
Waitlists are deactivated for the Course Offering
Waitlists are deactivated for at least one Course Offering associated with this co-located activity
You are about to leave this page and any unsaved changes will not be retained?
Colocating this activity offering will delete all of its requested and actual scheduling information. Would you like to proceed?
